item.title: Zoom Add-in How to Guide
item.description: Overview # This document describes the process for scheduling a Zoom meeting in Outlook for Apple devices. To schedule meetings using the Zoom add-in in Outlook, you need the following elements on your Apple device: Companyâ€™s Exchange or Microsoft 365 account Zoom account Zoom for Outlook add-in Installing the Zoom Add-in # The Zoom for Outlook add-in enables you to schedule meetings within the Outlook application. You can install the add-in on the following devices:
